scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises letters to John Wesley Hunt of Lexington, Kentucky, from business associates; a land agreement between Thomas D. Carneal and John H. Hanna; and a bill of exchange in John W. Hunt's favor. Letters discuss rates of exchange, account statements, money notes, John W. Hunt's subscription to the Bank of the U.S. in Lexington, tobacco sales, and legal matters.
